location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map of Operations Against Dilwar 10th to 16th August 1915’

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India. S.D.O. No. 1376, October, 1915.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by contours.Sketch map of Dilwar produced to illustrate a report on British military operations in the area between the 10th and 16th August 1915 showing the location of Dilwar forts, base camp and enemy’s refuge encampment.Grid reference overprinted in black with borders lettered and numbered for reference.Bottom right hand corner: ‘(Sd.) C.E.H. Whintle, Major, 96th Infantry’.
